question: For the following statements, please tell me how strongly you agree or disagree: Public officials don't care much what people like me think.
For the following statements, please tell me how strongly you agree or disagree: People like me don't have any say about what the government does.
For the following statements, please tell me how strongly you agree or disagree: Many women interpret innocent remarks or acts as being sexist.
For the following statements, please tell me how strongly you agree or disagree: Women seek to gain power by getting control over men.
For the following statements, please tell me how strongly you agree or disagree: Public officials don't care much what people like me think.
For the following statements, please tell me how strongly you agree or disagree: People like me don't have any say about what the government does.
For the following statements, please tell me how strongly you agree or disagree: Our society should do whatever is necessary to make sure that everyone has an equal opportunity to succeed.
For the following statements, please tell me how strongly you agree or disagree: This country would be better off if we worried less about how equal people are.
For the following statements, please tell me how strongly you agree or disagree: It is not really that big a problem if some people have more of a chance in life than others.
For the following statements, please tell me how strongly you agree or disagree: If people were treated more equally in this country we would have many fewer problems.
For the following statements, please tell me how strongly you agree or disagree: The world is always changing and we should adjust our view of moral behavior to those changes.
For the following statements, please tell me how strongly you agree or disagree: This country would have many fewer problems if there were more emphasis on traditional family ties.

For the following statements, please tell me how strongly you agree or disagree: Irish, Italian, Jewish and many other minorities overcame prejudice and worked their way up. Blacks should do the same without any special favors.

For the following statements, please tell me how strongly you agree or disagree: Generations of slavery and discrimination have created conditions that make it difficult for blacks to work their way out of the lower class.
For the following statements, please tell me how strongly you agree or disagree: Over the past few years, blacks have gotten less than they deserve.

For the following statements, please tell me how strongly you agree or disagree: It's really a matter of some people not trying hard enough; if blacks would only try harder they could be just as well off as whites.
For the following statements, please tell me how strongly you agree or disagree: Immigrants increase crime rates in the United States.

Some people don't pay much attention to political campaigns. How about you? Would you say that you have been very much interested, somewhat interested or not much interested in the political campaigns so far this year?
How often can you trust the federal government in Washington to do what is right?
How often can you trust the court system to do what is right?
Would you say the government is pretty much run by a few big interests looking out for themselves or that it is run for the benefit of all the people?
answers: 1. Run by a few big interests
2. For the benefit of all the people

question: Do you think that people in government waste a lot of the money we pay in taxes, waste some of it, or don't waste very much of it?
How many of the people running the government are corrupt?
Generally speaking, how often can you trust other people?
How much do you feel that having elections makes the government pay attention to what the people think?
Which party do you think would do a better job of handling the nation's economy?
answers: 1. Democrats would do a much better job
2. Democrats would do a somewhat better job
4. Republicans would do a somewhat better job
5. Republicans would do a much better job

question: Which party do you think would do a better job of handling immigration?
answers: 1. Democrats would do a much better job
2. Democrats would do a somewhat better job
4. Republicans would do a somewhat better job
5. Republicans would do a much better job

question: Which party do you think would do a better job of handling the environment?
answers: 1. Democrats would do a much better job
2. Democrats would do a somewhat better job
4. Republicans would do a somewhat better job
5. Republicans would do a much better job

question: Congress: Do you trust it a lot, trust it somewhat, do not trust it very much, or do not trust it at all?
The government: Do you trust it a lot, trust it somewhat, do not trust it very much, or do not trust it at all?
The judiciary: Do you trust it a lot, trust it somewhat, do not trust it very much, or do not trust it at all?
Scientists: Do you trust them a lot, trust them somewhat, do not trust them very much, or do not trust them at all?
Political parties: Do you trust them a lot, trust them somewhat, do not trust them very much, or do not trust them at all?
Traditional news media (such as newspapers, television or radio): Do you trust them a lot, trust them somewhat, do not trust them very much, or do not trust them at all?
Social media (such as Facebook, Twitter or X, or Instagram): Do you trust them a lot, trust them somewhat, do not trust them very much, or do not trust them at all?
How well does the following statement describe your view? Our political system only works for the insiders with money and power.’
How well does the following statement describe your view? Because of the rich and powerful, it becomes difficult for the rest of us to get ahead.’
Do you think you get more than your fair share in life, less than your fair share, or about the right amount?
How much opportunity is there in America today for the average person to get ahead?
How often do you think police officers use more force than is necessary?
How worried are you that the United States will experience a terrorist attack in the near future?
Do you favor, oppose, or neither favor nor oppose the U.S. making free trade agreements with other countries?
Does the increasing number of people of many different races and ethnic groups in the United States make this country a better place to live, a worse place to live, or does it make no difference?
Should the federal minimum wage be raised, kept the same, lowered but not eliminated, or eliminated altogether?
